entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ARM64 - Follow-up on `x < 0` and `x >= 0` #83562
    8.0.0
  • System.Net.WebSockets.Client.Tests.InvokerCancelTest.ConnectAsync_Cancel_ThrowsCancellationException test fails #83560
  • Unnecessary ApiCompat CP0001 errors when type forwards used #83555
  • CI failures on System.Runtime.Serialization.Xml.Tests #83551
    8.0.0
  • `JsonNode.GetPath()` doesn't consider character escaping #83547
  • [mono] Make mono_inst_name less misleading #83545
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Enable reusing System.Net.Http.Headers.*HeaderValue instances to improve efficiency. #83543
  • Crashes when initializing System.Net.Security.Native #83540
  • Handle recursive type graphs in config binding generator #83539
    8.0.0
  • Improve formatting of config binder generator output #83538
    8.0.0
  • [QUIC] Test .NET 7.0 on MsQuic 2.2 #83537
    8.0.0
  • Respect language version in config binding source generator #83535
    8.0.0
  • Iterate on config binding generator parsing pipeline to benefit from input caching provided by the incremental-generator feature #83534
    8.0.0
  • Implement proper parsing of primitives with System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter converters in config binder generator #83533
    8.0.0
  • Consolidate packaging targets to handle multi-targeting & off-by-default source generators #83532
    8.0.0
  • Address feedback from initial config binding generator PR #83531
    8.0.0
  • UdpClient inconsistent behaviour between Windows and Linux. #83525
  • PLINQ query crashes a .NET Core 6 application due to unhandled InvalidCastException thrown from System.Threading.Tasks.Task.RunContinuations. #83520
  • [nodejs] SendReceiveTest.ReceiveAsync_MultipleOutstandingReceiveOperations_Throws unit test hangs #83517
    Future
  • Implement missing cases for GlobalizationNative_GetLocaleInfoString #83514
    8.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Text.Json.Serialization.Tests.WriteJson<HashSet<String>> #83523
  • `Failed to create CoreCLR, HRESULT: 0x8007000E` on linux-musl-x86 #83509
  • Unable to load assemblies using SDK 7.0.202 but worked on SDK 7.0.201 #83526
    7.0.x
  • DataSet.ReadXml reads data from incorrect tags #83507
  • CPU usage increases after upgrading to .NET 6 #83505
  • [wasm] Do not use dotnet.js.symbols when measuring browser-bench sample #83502
  • Net Framework 4.8: A lot of Async Pinned System.Threading.OverlappedData #83500
  • [browser][publish][relink] Emscripten does not parse unicode in the path #83497
  • Make non-file URL support optional in XmlUrlResolver #83495
    8.0.0

Closed

  • Convert to GeneratedRegexAttribute fixer should preserve references to const string fields #79895
    8.0.0
  • Perf regression: Max working set on ARM #83527
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: remove dependency on System.Drawing.Common from System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager #64592
    8.0.0
  • Segmentation fault while executing System.Net tests in linux x64 coreclr #83482
  • System.Management.dll not working on win-arm64 #81400
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add limit "Task" #83529
  • System.Net.MailAddress.TryCreate parses input with spaces into a valid email address #82689
    Future
  • FileSystemWatcher monitors a shared AWS FSx #83501
  • Could not resolve SDK location on mac #83469
  • .NET runtime not found on Ubuntu #79237
  • Blazor Wasm Debugging Crashes on Startup #83521
  • How to calculate the progress of hashing System.IO.Hashing? #83508
  • NativeAOT doesn't produce IL2109 - RUC on base type #81158
  • [libraries-jitstress x86] FileSystemWatcher_InternalBufferSize_SynchronizingObject fails with "Did not observe an error event within 500ms and 3 attempts." #77676
    8.0.0
  • SetBrowserRequestCredentials doesn't work in combination with headers #81952
  • Regressions from "Avoid xchg for resolution" #81768
    8.0.0
  • [Perf] Windows/arm64: 1 Regression on 3/7/2023 1:52:33 AM #83217
  • Live apphost not being used by crossgen2 with source build #77667
    Future
  • Create proxy when deserialize #83454
  • Quic listener disposal throws QuicException #81422
    8.0.0
  • Publish Error In Using Japanese Char Account #78953
    8.0.0
  • Some OOB assemblies are not copying intellisense extracted from docs package #82214
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Regex .ctor(string, TimeSpan) #80835
    Future
  • `NetworkInformationException DirectoryNotFoundException: Could not find a part of the path '/proc/sys/net/ipv4/conf/lo/forwarding'` with NET 7.0.2 on gVisor #81061
    7.0.x
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Generators.Roslyn4.0.Tests segfault in Mono #81249
    8.0.0
  • Update the HWIntrinsics to allow removal where no side-effects exist #64962
    8.0.0
  • Improve codegen for inserting zeros. #53713
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge binary perf with big endian #83561
    area-Serialization
  • disable NTLM tests on RedHat.7 #83559
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Prefer gold linker on linux #83558
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Improve servicing docs for Microsoft.Windows.Compatibility #83557
    documentation, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.x
  • [mono] Calling static virtual method in interface #83556
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Initial step for adding AssemblyBuilder.Save implementation #83554
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Fix Wrong Date Format in Test Logs #83553
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Remove double quotes from OwnerCompositeExecutable #83552
    area-R2RDump-coreclr
  • Implement checking for Requires* on attributes for NativeAOT #83550
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Fix System.Management wminet_utils.dll lookup code for arm64 #83549
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Management, 7.0.5
  • [mono] Allow a single call when inlining methods #83548
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [release/6.0] Fix System.Management wminet_utils.dll lookup code for arm64 #83546
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Management, 6.0.16
  • [Mono] Intrinsify As* on ARM64 with mini JIT #83544
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Revert "ActiveIssue for BuildInvalidSignatureTwice on mono interpreter." #83542
    area-System.Security
  • Switch tests for --additionalprobingpath to mocked components #83541
    test-enhancement, area-Host
  • [test] Try to use nodejs instead of v8 #83524
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [mono][llvm] Enable the cold calling conv on osx/linux. #83519
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Cleanup some HWIntrinsic logic to ensure the right gtType and simdSize are being set #83516
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][jit] Adding compare all/any intrinsics. #83515
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [mono][interp] Add super instruction for common left shift pattern #83512
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [mono][aot] Load AOT module of a container assembly using assembly name #83511
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 8.0.0
  • [browser] Fix encoding problem when publishing with AOT #83510
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, wasm-aot-test
  • Add async post to deep-dive-blog-posts.md #83506
    area-Meta
  • [wasi] AOT support #83496
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi
  • don't load MsQuic unless needed by HttpClient #83494
    area-System.Net.Http
  • update msquic #83493
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Shortcut some generic lookups #83491
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Jiterpreter monitoring phase take 2 #83489
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • Slightly improve struct zeroing & copying #83488
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [android][ios] Add SDK and workload to support library mode #83487
    area-Build-mono

Merged

  • [JIT] ARM64 - Optimize `x < 0` and `x >= 0` #83176
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Convert to GeneratedRegexAttribute fixer should preserve references to const string fields #81997
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution
  • CoreCLR support for InlineArrayAttribute. (struct layout part) #82744
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • [mono] Raise inlining length limit in the interpreter from 20 to 30 #83490
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • fix a bug where totalCPU count was being used for cachesize computation #83528
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Create source generator for configuration binding #82179
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Remove S.S.Permissions reference from S.DirectoryServices #82453
    area-System.DirectoryServices, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 8.0.0
  • Fix System.Management wminet_utils.dll lookup code for arm64 #83522
    area-System.Management
  • [browser] disable startupMemoryCache by default #83536
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Adding support for Vector512 bitwise operations: And, AndNot, Or, OnesComplement, and Xor #83354
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, arch-avx512
  • [node] unblock WS tests #83518
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Use SOS to dump managed stack traces from a dump on Windows #82867
    area-Infrastructure
  • Change LSRA to more efficiently initialize the availableRegs array #83479
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Change execution order conditions for intellisense swapping and copying msbuild targets. #83117
    documentation, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Implements Requires*Attribute on class behavior for NativeAOT #83417
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Lower div.un to shr.un.imm #83498
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [QUIC] Updated generated interop files from msquic #83092
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [browser] Fix encoding problem when publishing #82833
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Remove System.Drawing.Common from runtime #83356
    area-System.Drawing
  • [wasm][debugger] Debug CI #83266
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Add host tests for asset resolution behaviour without fallback graph #83434
    area-Host

Updated

  • Ensure free buffer space when reading TLS messages #83480
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [NativeAOT] Support exporting methods from referenced assemblies in a formal way #83396
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [tasks] Add auto runtime initialization template to LibraryBuilder #83050
    area-Build-mono
  • Change `callvirt` into `calli` for virtual delegates #83461
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Fix BeginReceiveMessageFromV4BoundToSpecificV6_NotReceived #83463
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • [release/7.0] Fix special sweep issue for workstation #83342
    Servicing-approved, area-GC-coreclr, 7.0.6
  • [release/7.0] Fixing a bug that causes us to mistakenly demote a gen2 region to gen0 #83341
    Servicing-approved, area-GC-coreclr, 7.0.6
  • Rename VirtualMethodTableManagedImplementation and add manual CCW to test generated RCW #83285
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Update xarch to track more instruction metadata as flags #83473
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • Test out new OSX 13 AppleTV queue #83272
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Adding support for `Vector512` `Equals`, `op_Equality`, and `op_Inequality`. #83470
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • toolchain.cmake: properly set toolchain for crossbuilding on Alpine Linux #83464
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Implement `ToggleBit` #83400
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [tests] Stand up iOS arm runtime tests and enable tracing/eventpipe tests #79169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono
  • [Mono] Intrinsify max/min on ARM64 with mini JIT #83468
    area-Codegen-Intrinsics-mono
  • Improve and enable writing test wrappers to disk #83444
    test-enhancement
  • [release/7.0] JIT: fix bug in cloning conditions for jagged array (#83414) #83462
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.6
  • WIP: Optimize `ComputeLastIndex` #83441
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • Arm64: Combine if conditions into compare chains #79283
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add x86 intrinsics to improve CRC32 performance #83321
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [browser] cleanup of early startup code #83411
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Prototype a generalized promotion pass #83388
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add option to decrypt Quic traffic in debug builds #83001
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [release/7.0] Default media type used when 'null' is passed to StringContent #81506 #83425
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Change IsolatedStorageFile path for mobile #83380
    area-System.IO, os-android, os-ios
  • Initial changes for GetLocaleInfoString #81470
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Optimize stackalloc zeroing via BLK #83255
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add linux-musl-riscv64 RID #83465
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [wasm] Post 3.1.30 emscripten bump feedback #83391
    8.0.0
  • SyntaxValueProvider: avoid performance issue with syntax list containing many items #83483
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, 8.0.0
  • use ROSpan in SslStreamCertificateContext #83485
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [eventpipe] Perform endian aware serialization of structs and arrays above FireETW layer #80493
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Replace a load with cheaper mov instruction when possible #83458
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fixes #79187 Add MemoryMappedFile.CreateFromFile(SafeFileHandle) overload #83134
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Unity managed runtime type name parsers #83484
    area-System.Reflection

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • How to make `dotnet run` invoke an MSBuild target? #31253
  • [SBRP] error CS0246 errors is generated TypeForwardAttributes #31250
    .NET 8.0
  • dotnet publish large use ram #31259
  • Workload installation failed: microsoft.ios.sdk::16.2.37 is not found in NuGet feeds #31260
  • Cannot build release net7.0-ios #31261

Closed

  • dotnet workload install wasm-tools hangs #31228
    Discussion
  • Verbatim strings compiled differently on linux and windows #31251
  • Using a ref property in an instance of a WinUI 3 XAML element (e.g. Window) causes a build error since XamlTypeInfo.g.cs get's improperly generated. #30708
  • ASP.NET MVC - view component fails to render via vc tag helper when build with .NET SDK 7.0.200 #30703

PullRequests

Created

  • Move RDG omission to ResolveTargetingPackAssets target #31265
    Area-AspNetCore
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #31262
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #31254
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [WIP] Add unit test for the TypeForwardedTo assembly attributes. #31252
    Area-GenAPI
  • Fix test failures caused by adjusting path of artifacts and the target framework of templates in built SDK #31239
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #31214
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Add PackageReference to new Roslyn package #29787
    Area-ILLink
  • add --create-manifest-if-needed flag #31231
    Area-Tools
  • [draft] moving dotnet/sdk-container-builds to dotnet/sdk #31181
  • Skip package when resolving package dependencies if it appears multiple times #30105
    Area-ReadyToRun
  • WebAssembly SDK #31154
    Area-AspNetCore

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-16
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Proposal: Fixed-size buffer types #1320
  • Allow fixed-size value buffers directly inside classes (ref types) #2120
  • [Proposal]: Conditional Assign #7062

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Collection literals #5354
    Working Set
  • Champion: fixed-sized buffers #1314
    Working Set
  • Primary Constructors #2691
    Working Set
  • Null-conditional assignment #6045
    Working Set

PullRequests

Created

  • Create safe-fixed-sized-buffers.md #7064

Merged

  • Add note about required members and struct defaults #7060

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SyntaxGenerator should not create a TupleTypeSyntax from an unbound generic ITypeSymbol #67341
  • EnC: switch diagnostic reporting to pull diagnostics #67339
  • Make EditAndContinueLanguageService a brokered service #67338
  • SyntaxGenerator doesn't support generation of record types #67335
  • Remove the ` bool IsUnsafe(this TypeSymbol type)` method #67330
  • Need to add support for `using unsafe static <Type>;` #67329
    C# 12.0
  • Inconsistent capitalisation of "Remove Unnecessary Usings" in lightbulb menu #67328
  • Record inheritdoc shows in quick info but still get CS1573 #67326
  • Inheritdoc doesn't work with path="/param[@name='<NAME>']" #67325

Closed

  • Compiler erroneously allows pointer to be used within a type-argument in a using-alias #67281
  • Add `Make property required` codefix for `CS8618` #66089
  • Null check can be simplified false positive #67193
  • Missing type arguments on method invocation with more than one type parameter produce unexpected syntax tree #67277

PullRequests

Created

  • Experimenting with compiler logs #67349
    Area-Infrastructure, Blocked
  • Work around arcade parsing bug #67348
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [infra] test fixes #67347
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2137261 #67346
  • Rename codefix predefined name #67345
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Code changes to allow 'using static unsafe' #67344
    Area-Compilers
  • Simplify creation of unbound generic types #67343
    Area-Compilers
  • Improve error recovery while parsing switch expressions. #67340
    Area-Compilers
  • Support generating records in syntax generator #67337
    Area-IDE
  • Cherry-pick static restore workaround #67336
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add net8.0 TFM to source-built packages #67333
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [Infra] Merge main-vs-deps into source branch #67332
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #67331
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • Disallow pointers inside generic type-arguments unless in an unsafe context (in C#12 and beyond). #67282
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Remove roslyn-auth.yml #67342
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Do not use the Lsp-Misc workspace in VS scenarios #67287
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Search a smaller scope when looking for references to a local symbol #67334
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Removed 'AnalyzerOptions' reference related to 'AdditionalFiles' #65851
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Implement 'Make field/property required' codefix #67175
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Improve perf of resolving local symbol keys #67324
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Framework compilers package for SDK consumption #66206
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Better parser error recovery when encountering a open generic name. #67278
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Remove descendent node tracking from SyntaxEditor #67314
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.6-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #67327
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.6 to main #67301
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next

Updated

  • Annotate MS.CA and MS.CA.C# for trimming #66519
    Area-Compilers
  • Hook up DidChangeConfiguration from client #66861
    Area-IDE
  • Bind extension declarations #67126
    Area-Compilers
  • Check count before reusing cached items in `BatchNode` #66992
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Semantic snippets - `enum` snippet #67184
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Remove invalid implicit downcast #19932
    Area-Compilers
  • Initial implementation of event hookup in object initializers. #56322
    Area-Compilers, 17.5
  • Make Document Outline computation and update asynchronous. #65641
    Area-IDE
  • Implement LSP inlay hints #67319
    Area-IDE
  • Generate branchless IL for `(b ? 1 : 0)` #67191
    Area-Compilers
  • Allow missing placeholders and locals in RefSafetyAnalysis visitor #67092
    Area-Compilers, Blocked, Pending director approval, 17.5
  • Fixup local diagnostic classification for accessor block #67312
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers
  • [Lightbulb Perf] Analyzer driver fixes for span-based analysis #67255
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers
  • Bump Microsoft.ServiceHub.Framework to 4.2.70-beta #67071
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • GetFolderPath call in Hosting negatively affects startup performance #47269
  • Output caching - support for donut caching #47268
  • Think about how to handle optional `params` arguments in RDG #47266
  • Perf regression: endpoint, multiple_queries, updates #47264
  • Perf improvement: json #47263
  • Make source for QuickGrid samples site public #47261
  • SignalR - Clients Not Receiving Messages in Integration Tests #47260
  • Container publish not functioning in DN8.P2; Worked in DN7 #47259
  • Preserve existing DOM elements when updating statically-rendered content #47258
    8.0-preview4
  • How to configure specific paths for an endpoint different from others? #47257
  • Any plans to add Token generation back into ASP.NET Core #47256
  • Simpler Alternative to WebApplicationFactory ("compose instead of inherit" / no `DeferredHost`) #47255
  • Theme: JS Frontends with .NET Backends #47254
    .NET 8.0
  • Output cache middleware throws when changing AllowCacheStorage on a later stage AND when AllowLocking = true. #47253
  • Refer `ActionResult` and `ActionResult<T>` from Blazor WebAssemly projects #47252
  • Output cache middleware does not vary by query params specified at runtime #47251
  • How to move state from backend to blazor server side #47249
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Negotiate fails at runtime with programs that use System.DirectoryServices.Protocols > 6.0.1 #47248
  • Remove duplicate tests from RDFTests for testing array binding support #47245
    8.0-preview4
  • RDG does not support route handlers that return an anonymous type #47244
    .NET 8 Planning

Closed

  • HttpContext.Response.ContentLength return null (with System.Text.Json) #47127
  • Benchmark stopped running: QueryCompilation #47265
  • .net 7 JwtBearerDefaults.AuthenticationScheme not work with Entity framework core Identity #47119
  • Request timeouts middleware #45732
    8.0-preview3
  • Consider a React Server Components-like Blazor hybrid #29577
    .NET 8 Planning
  • API for registering endpoints that render Razor components. #46350
    8.0-preview3
  • [Design] Blazor United: Layering architecture #46393
    8.0-preview3
  • In the core, why is there only ActionNameAttribute and no ControlNameAttribute #47171
  • [AOT] Clean up gRPC template #46465
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Support parameters bound from an array of types in RequestDelegateGenerator #46785
    8.0-preview3
  • The "ComplexObjectModelBinder" instead of the "ComplexTypeModelBinder" class access type change issue #46775
  • Local build for v6.0.14 on Linux (WSL) is failing on Yarn #46821

PullRequests

Created

  • Enable AOT template tests #47247
    area-mvc, area-web-frameworks

Merged

  • Add area-infrastructure label to wtgodbe's PRs #47262
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview3
  • Implement request timeout middleware #46115
    area-runtime, community-contribution, blog-candidate, 8.0-preview3
  • Update gRPC template to use 2.52.0 #47214
    area-grpc, 8.0-preview3
  • RDG array handling. #47086
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview3
  • Remove unnecessary trimming workarounds #47241
    area-security

Updated

  • Ability to monitor Blazor Server circuit activity #46968
    area-blazor
  • Meter factory prototype #46834
    area-runtime, * NO MERGE *
  • Only invoke 'IsService' check once in resolution #47097
    area-runtime
  • Add short circuit in routing #46713
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Add SectionName to SectionOutlet and SectionContent #47221
    area-blazor
  • [Web.JS] call mono_wasm_gc_lock in MonoHeapLock #46909
    area-blazor
  • Issue 33368, Solution to resolve "System.InvalidOperationException" inside "HandleForbiddenAsync" method. #47089
    area-security, community-contribution
  • Handle Task/ValueTask.CompletedTask return in RDG #47211
    area-runtime
  • Use IProblemDetailsService in ProblemHttpResult #47100
    area-runtime, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Make TLS & QUIC Pay-for-Play #47209
    area-runtime

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-16
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Provide more control over when a complete (blind) load of all symbols occurs #3737
    8.0.0
  • Native and Managed Heap Improvements #3736
    8.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Taskbar badge notifications for Windows apps #13994
    Backlog
  • Elements in ColumnDefinition with star width are not displayed when the Grid is in a StackLayout #13993
  • XAML Hot Reload is broken within Shell.TitleView #13992
    Backlog
  • Airplane Mode causes app to crash with no message #13991
    Backlog
  • Border does not change rendering when modifying StrokeShape properties #13988
    Backlog
  • Image.Shadow inconsistent on Android #13981
    Backlog
  • Adding new items to Shell.Current.Items or updating IsVisible on existing records does not re-render flyout menu #13980
    Backlog
  • [WinUI] Style applied to `Label` displays different if using `Text` or `FormattedText` #13977

Closed

  • [Android] Listview Header content disappears while scrolling #12312
    Backlog
  • AppThemeBinding not working well on macOS #11119
    Backlog
  • App.Current.RequestedThemeChanged doesn't fire #10310
    Backlog
  • Application.Current.RequestedThemeChanged has not be triggered on Mac #10055
    Backlog
  • Published version of app with Popups crashes #11976
  • File picker not work when publish MAUI as exe on Windows server 2019 +windows 10 #12052
  • Black screen with Maui Blazor Hybrid in Net 7 #13291
  • Building untrimmed application on Android on Release ends with Exception 'Unable to find Java.Lang.AbstractMethodError constructor' #7284
  • Modal Navigation does not work or throws exception prior to Window Creation/Parenting #8157
    .NET 8 Planning
  • [Android]VerticalStackLayout HorizontalOptions= Center is not working on Android #5119
    Backlog
  • Images 90 degrees rotated in iOS #13978
  • Slider Thumb Wrong in iOS, OK on Windows #8364
  • IPreference not initialized #13759
  • [Catalyst] Reusing Modal Page causes inner page contents to resize incorrectly, breaking page. #13697
    Backlog
  • Build Liberty failed (Partial method ) #8950
  • Using Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebView.WindowsForms in Visual Studio says it does not have a strong name #13711

PullRequests

Created

  • Ensure that Grid is treating star rows/columns as Auto when unconstrained #13999
    area/layout 🔲
  • [net7.0] Cast to a less derived type on TabbedPageManager (#13689) #13998
    area/TabbedPage
  • [controls] fix cases a GC causes events to not fire #13997
    area/perf 🏎️
  • Removed Duplicate code in RadioButton.Tizen #13996
    area/controls 🎮, platform/tizen, partner/tizen
  • Fix issues with shell and pushing modals early #13990
    area/shell 🐢
  • [net7.0] [Windows] Fixed dupe items in ShellView #13987
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/shell 🐢
  • Bump Microsoft.WindowsAppSDK from 1.2.230217.4 to 1.2.230313.1 #13984
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump NUnit3TestAdapter from 4.3.1 to 4.4.2 #13983
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Merged

  • Fix Android ListView header / footer gone (#12312) #13712
    community ✨, area/ListView
  • [macOS/iOS] Fix RequestedThemeChanged event #11199
    t/bug, area/Xaml </>, backport/suggested, area/theme
  • [net7.0] Blank image when Source set to null or on image loading error #13989
    area/image :framed_picture:, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [net7.0] Fix a couple life cycle scenarios on shell modals #13986
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/shell 🐢
  • [net7.0] Cache the dynamic AppTheme value in Controls (and not Essentials) (#11200) #13963
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Fix syncing modal stack when the window is created/recreated #13025
    t/breaking 💥, area/modal, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Make Android sizing of ShapeViews consistent with iOS and Windows #6206
    t/bug, area/layout 🔲, area/drawing ✏️
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #13974
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fix typo in PathBuilder.cs #13979
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, community ✨
  • Enable parallel builds back #10420
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fix ListProxy GC issues #13973

Updated

  • [iOS] Scroll with the keyboard to not block entries and editors #13499
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, layout-scrollview, keyboard
  • Show keyboard on Android entry/editor/searchbar focus #13908
    area/controls 🎮, keyboard
  • Invalidate shapes changing any property inside the brushes (Fill, Stroke) #13905
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮
  • Fix memory leak in VisualElement.Shadow #13960
    t/bug, area/perf 🏎️
  • Implement Keyboard on SearchBarHandler #9851
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • [Android] Fix controls RTL issues #13672
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮
  • [Windows] Implement SearchBar CancelButtonColor on Windows #13622
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • Catch InvalidProtocolBufferException creating EncryptedSharedPreferences #13599
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • Style specificity #13818
    area/Xaml </>
  • Fix next keyboard into a ListView and TableView iOS #13838
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, area/ListView, control-entry
  • Add SwipeItems to LogicalChildren #13864
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • Reinstate WebView cookie functionality for Android & iOS #13736
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • [Android] Fix issue calculating the threshold using SwipeItemViews #13615
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • [Essentials] Remove Task.Run from SecureStorage #13940
    area/essentials 🍞
  • [Windows] Fix Shadow positions issues #13959
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️
  • Run templates on Android and iOS #13662
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, area/testing
  • [controls] fix memory leaks in `Page` & navigation #13833

  • [Android] Allow to update Entry Background (once established) #12227

  • [Windows] Changes in SwipeViewHandler #11229
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • Avoid crash using BoxView visibility (avoid unnecessary parent) #11439
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮
  • [iOS] Fix SearchBar focus issues #11698
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • [iOS] Implement ScrollView Orientation #13657

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Bump Mono.TextTemplating from 2.2.1 to 2.3.1 #30512
  • Is MigrationsAssembly when using a seperate migration project if you aren't migrating in your app #30510
  • InvalidCastException: Unable to cast object of type 7.0.4 #30506
  • InfrastructureExtensions GetService throws an error. #30504
  • Migrations fails since EF Core 7.0.4 #30503
  • Nullable Model Differences between EF Core 6 -> EF Core 7 #30502
  • Cannot find module './en.js' ; Zone: <root> ; Task: Promise.then ; Value: Error: Cannot find module './en.js' #30499
  • Navigation Property with backing fields can't work in Lazy Load mode #30498
  • Configure computed database property values using expressions #30496

Closed

  • Simplified and quick database migrations #30456
  • @pawansingh168 this doesn't seem to be related to EF Core in any way, but rather an Angular/Javascript issue. If you believe this is related to EF, please paste a runnable, minimal code sample showing what's going on. #30507
  • @pawansingh168 this doesn't seem to be related to EF Core in any way, but rather an Angular/Javascript issue. If you believe this is related to EF, please paste a runnable, minimal code sample showing what's going on. #30508
  • @pawansingh168 this doesn't seem to be related to EF Core in any way, but rather an Angular/Javascript issue. If you believe this is related to EF, please paste a runnable, minimal code sample showing what's going on. #30509
  • Defining a navigation to another table in an Owned Type #30500
  • Scaffold-DbContext fails: System.InvalidOperationException: The key {'DocumentTypeId'} cannot be added to keyless type 'DocumentType (Dictionary<string, object>)'. #30448
  • SqlQuery doesn't support scalar values but works with unmapped types #30447
  • Should consider saving any type as text or JSON text. #30361
  • SQL Server: Set operations should work if normalized store type is the same #29020
    8.0.0-preview3
  • 生成的模型中get、set访问器问题（The generated model get, set accessor problem） #30497
  • How does ChangeTracker know that something was changed? #30490

PullRequests

Merged

  • Fix bad merge. #30511
  • Bump Newtonsoft.Json from 13.0.2 to 13.0.3 #30465
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:

Updated

  • [release/7.0] Fix to #30358 - Duplicate table alias in generated select query (An item with the same key has already been added) #30486
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.6
